title: Exclusion and Holiness in the Camp
summary: Deuteronomy 23 lists those who are excluded from the assembly of Israel and gives rules about cleanliness, loans, and vows. The emphasis is on maintaining holiness in God's presence.

faq.question: Why were some people excluded from the assembly?
faq.answer: Because of specific moral or ancestral reasons to preserve holiness in the community.
